general you have the ability to spin up now hundreds to even thousands of servers within minutes no longer you
have to wait three to four weeks for the old days of getting a machine and starting to work with it you also have
great cost savings that come with this because you only pay for what you use and this is based on the service you're
using by the second or millisecond and so those capital expenditures for those
machines now turn into variable expenses and now those variable expenses are actually less cheaper than what most
companies can do for themselves due to AWS these economies of scale next is
elasticity with AWS you can you no longer the provision that machines for

it's not network security we have something called a shared responsibility model
which means in AWS we protect the cloud and then we rely on our users you guys
to protect what's in the cloud your applications so we will provide network security we'll provide physical data
center security which is a lot of heavy lifting and then we look at you to make sure that the applications that you
